Class BaseCsvAction

  • java.lang.Object

      • nl.strohalm.cyclos.controls.BaseAction
        • nl.strohalm.cyclos.controls.BaseAjaxAction
          • nl.strohalm.cyclos.controls.BaseCsvAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocalSettingsChangeListener, SettingsChangeListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExportAdsToCsvAction, ExportBrokeringsToCsvAction, ExportCardsToCsvAction, ExportElementsToCsvAction, ExportLoanPaymentsToCsvAction, ExportLoansToCsvAction, ExportMemberRecordsToCsvAction, ExportMembersListReportToCsvAction, ExportMembersTransactionsDetailsToCsvAction, ExportMembersTransactionsReportToCsvAction, ExportPendingMembersToCsvAction, ExportTransactionsToCsvAction, SmsLogsReportCsvAction

    public abstract class BaseCsvAction
extends BaseAjaxAction
implements LocalSettingsChangeListener
    Base class for CSV export actions
    Author:
    luis

        protected boolean shouldLimit()
